title: ISic000172. Funerary epitaph for Eunus
body:
Facsimile Images

1ivy-leafDM
2ivy-leafEUNUS
3VIXivy-leafANX͡VI

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy

English translation

To the Shades of the Underworld. Eunus lived 16 years.

commentary

The name Eunus is familiar in Sicily from the name of the leader of the first Sicilian slave revolt (135-132 BCE), but is otherwise unattested on the island.

bibliography

  • 10.7402 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 93 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Fiorelli NSA 1880 200 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
